content:
Hi all! John will join us for our next OWG meeting to give us the rundown on the NCAR EdEC recommendations, I will send him an invite. This is currently scheduled for Tues Aug 30 at 9 am MDT as usual. With the new IWG/EWG schedule, this means it won't be until after two more meetings including the entire next EWG meeting.

  • Should we consider bumping up our OWG meetings a week (so that we have something to report to EWG in a consistent and timely way) or totally changing our meeting day/timeslot?
  • Also a nudge for us to iron out our AMS abstract responsibilities asynchronously this week and next regardless, since those abstracts are due end-ish of next week.
